options.name: channel
options.description: The channel the announcement will be posted to > #channel/channelid

options.name: color
options.description: The color the announcement embed will have > Red, Orange, Yellow, Green, Blue, Indigo, Violet

options.name: announcement
options.description: The announcement that has to be made

options.name: mode
options.description: Mode: Check, add or remove an autorole > check/add/remove

options.name: role
options.description: The role that the autorole has to be set to > @role / roleid

name: citizen
description: Give the @Citizen role to a member

options.name: member
options.description: The member that the role has to be given to > @member/memberid

options.name: amount
options.description: The amount of messages to purge > 1 - 99

name: dashboard
description: Get the URL to the dashboard

name: gcancel
description: Cancel a specific giveaway, using its messageid

name: gcheck
description: Check the ongoing and ended giveaways

name: gend
description: End a specific giveaway, using its messageid

options.name: channel
options.description: The channel the giveaway will be hosted in > #channel/channelid

options.name: duration
options.description: How long the giveaway will last > d/h/m (only 1 option accepted!)

options.name: prize
options.description: The prize the winner will receive

name: greroll
description: Reroll a specific giveaway, using its messageid

name: ping
description: Calculates the bot's message latency and the Discord API heartbeat's ping

name: uncitizen
description: Remove the @Citizen role from a member

options.name: member
options.description: The member that the role has to be removed from > @member/memberid
